thread.title: Lovely Parisian Hotel -
thread.title_full: Lovely Parisian Hotel - Review of Hotel de Varenne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rachael T
title: Lovely Parisian Hotel -
text: A beautiful hotel in a lovely quiet area, close to all attractions. The staff were really friendly and helpful and the hotel was so clean. Our room was beautifully decorated and we even had complimentary robes and slippers! There's a lovely little area outside the front of the hotel to sit and have a drink. I will definitely be staying here again next time I come to Paris :-)
